std_change_template.name: Meraki New Network Provisioning
std_change_template.template:
short_description=New Meraki Network Provisioning for Site #^description=New site creation per PM request #^implementation_plan=Use the network provisioning interface to provision new site prior to installation: https://dev12118.service-now.com/x_170302_global_index.do#/
Must have the following variables: template name, network name, network tag, and site address. All gear is to be provisioned PRIOR to connecting to the network. Change window is from 5 pm-7 pm in the time zone of the network being created.^backout_plan=1. Log into Meraki Dashboard (dashboard.meraki.com) 2. Go to Organization>Monitor>Overview 3. Select newly created network and click delete. 4. Confirm the selected network by checking the box next to: "I acknowledge that deleting these networks is irreversible and wish to continue". 5. Click delete network^test_plan=Previous networks created and bound to the same template with no issues. Also network will be provisioned prior to connecting hardware to the network.^assignment_group=287ebd7da9fe198100f92cc8d1d2154e^justification=Request per PM project #^risk_impact_analysis=None. Network creation is bound to a pre-defined template with changes to the network.^EQ
